entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DirectoryEntry RefreshCache for property subset not clearing uncommitted changes #87197
  • JsonSourceGenerationOptionsAttribute should provide an option for enabling string enum serialization globally #87195
    8.0.0
  • Dynamic PGO Microbenchmark Regressions #87194
    8.0.0
  • Calling a Vararg P/Invoke from another assembly fails to call underlying native function #87188
  • [NativeAOT] Simplify build integration with external bundlers for Apple platforms #87187
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: AssemblyLoadContext.TryLoadFromAssemblyName #87185
  • Arm64: Revisit ExecutableAllocator::MapRW performance on arm64 #87184
  • [QUIC] Remove hacks to install libnuma in CI #87181
    8.0.0
  • Arm64: Higher calls to madvise/mprotect/mbind #87173
  • Open terminal/bash/console/cmd on macOS/linux using ProcessStartInfo and RedirectStandardOutput/Error #87172
  • Provide a new NumberStyles option to stop parsing after the first invalid character #87171
    8.0.0
  • [mono][tvos] Failing Vector64/128 tests #87164
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 59 Regressions due to PGO update #87179
  • GeneratedComInterface interfaces should emit a diagnostic for non-static properties and events #87158
    8.0.0

Closed

  • The fastest way to html encode string to Utf8 string #35004
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Utf8.IsValid(...) #86937
  • Investigate microbenchmarks that regress with PGO enabled #84264
    8.0.0
  • [Announcement] Minimum .NET SDK version updated to 8.0.100 Preview 4 #86517
  • running windows code in net6 target project #86797
  • jit/performance/codequality/benchmarksgame/k-nucleotide/k-nucleotide-9/k-nucleotide-9.sh #67675
    8.0.0
  • superpmi-diffs results improvements #75848
    8.0.0
  • Use prolog-zero init knowledge in VN to delete branches #51472
    8.0.0
  • "Unsafe" in UnsafeRelaxedJsonEscaping is misleading from a security standpoint, in both directions #87138
  • Default JSON escaping is biased against other languages #86805
  • [API Proposal]: JsonEncoder (rather than JavaScriptEncoder) #86810
    Future
  • Consider adding a JavaScriptEncoder implementation that doesn't encode the block list or surrogate pairs. #42847
    Future
  • [mono][wasm] System.Numerics.Vectors.Tests assert equal failure #84775
    8.0.0
  • superpmi: add real world benchmarks collection #79015
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty / ThrowIfNull / ThrowIfNullOrWhiteSpace with custom message #86833

PullRequests

Created

  • Warn on CustomMarshallerAnalyzer if the MarshaMode is not valid #87198
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix Crossgen2 determinism issue #87193
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update branding to 7.0.8 #87192
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.19 #87191
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Upgrade to LLVM 16, and stop focusing on C++11 ABI stuff from CentOS 7 #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono][arm64] Handle sysctlbyname failing to find system options. #87189
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Fix a couple of inequalities in promotion decomposition #87186
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Linker parallel OutputStep #87182
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix creating cultures with extensions in the name #87177
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Globalization, 6.0.x
  • Make BundleLocalizedApp test stop requiring UTF8 output encoding #87176
    area-Single-File
  • [release/7.0-staging] #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #87175
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix a couple of issues related to Process.WaitForExit on Unix #87174
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [wasm][globalization] `HybridGlobalization` remove code conditionally for `WasmBuildNative` #87170
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [wasm][ios] Unblock System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.Tests Fails on iOS/tvOS/Wasm #87169
    arch-wasm, area-System.IO, os-ios, os-tvos
  • fix(66900): Adding test for confirm bug fix. #87167
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use Unsafe.BitCast for Interlocked.{Compare}Exchange of float/double #87166
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • JIT: Regularize readbacks for parameters/OSR-locals in physical promotion #87165
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Enable DriveInfoUnix test on tvOS #87162
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [interp] Add MINT_STELEM_VT_NOREF #87161
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Update ClaimsIdentity debug display #87159
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] Disable System.Text.Json/AOT tests #87157
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-System.Text.Json

Merged

  • JIT: Clean up BB successor iteration #86839
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup scripts for PGO cleanup (dotnet/performance#3067). #87163
    tenet-performance-benchmarks, needs-area-label
  • Fix creating cultures with extensions in the name #87114
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Enable EventPipe support in MacOS #86766
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2194745 #87168
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update area-owners.json to reflect change in area-owners.md #87144
    area-Meta
  • [fabricbot] Do not add needs-further-triage to issues still marked as untriaged #87160
    area-Meta
  • update QuicConnection.ConnectAsync exceptions #87048
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging][mono][debugger] Remove cast bug #86862
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.x
  • [mono] Reenabled k-nucleotide-9 test. #87058
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix arithmetics #86996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm][debugger] Disable failing multithreading debugger tests #86501
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [fabricbot] Area pods: Exclude arch- and os- issues/prs with owners #87040
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Perf blazor scenarios: Use the correct wasm sdk pack #87075
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Superpmi collection for real-world benchmarks #87104
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Fix inline decision reporting + noinline propagation #87115
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add workaround `NuGet-Migrations` issue for a missed case #87041
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [CoreCLR] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` non-generic support #86932
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Update logging with processor pipeline #86995
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Repurpose Gen0ReductionCount field for dynamic heap count diagnostics. #87009
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn on visibility of interface and StringMarshallingCustomType #87065
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add managed entry points for raising Contention events #87087
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Add back fixed xunit decimal, IntPtr and UIntPtr commented test cases #87084
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Handle Vector multiplication for long/ulong as intrinsic on pre-AVX512 hardware #87142
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add marshalling tests and warn if interface is partial #87146
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [browser][MT] GC, threadpool and some JS interop improvements #86759
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Implement JsonStringEnumConverter<TEnum> #87149
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Add mono hot reload support for updating parameter name #85796
    area-EnC-mono
  • Ensure the CPUID tests cover a couple hwintrinsic disablement edge cases #87127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upgrading Vector256/512 Shuffle() with VBMI support #87083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Inline TLS field access for linux #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] ThreadStatics part 2 #87148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix creating cultures with extensions in the name #87152
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Globalization, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] Use underlying type in RuntimeHelpers.GetSpanDataFrom #87021
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 7.0.8
  • Combine two table lookups into one while formatting Guid on Arm64 #87126
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][debugger] Support new JMC #86815
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add IHostApplicationBuilder interface #86974
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Handle diagnostic port configuration in NativeAOT #87088
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement collation native functions functions #86895
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js - follow up #87051
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • The CLA bot can now be rerun with a comment. Fix broken CLA links. #86825
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • {U}Int128 support for Utf8Formatter/Parser #86357
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample as functional test on the simulator and maccatalyst on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Always look for SIMD fields during promotion #84122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Block calls into managed code after a runtime assert #87043
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm][debugging] Enable debugging when Device Toolbar is enabled and Iphone is selected #86920
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix trim analyzer warning for inferred type arguments #87156
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Support nocheck prefix #81615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • JIT: expand qmarks earlier #86778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][infra] Upgrade iOS performance queue to OSX 13 #86574
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Added IReadOnlyDictionary to HttpRequestOptions #86983
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Add JIT support for the methods in Vector128<T> on amd64. #86546
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix handling of CreateScalarUnsafe for embedded broadcast #87134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Improve codegen for AVX-512 comparisons and general handling of `TYP_MASK` #87089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [VM] Fix potential undefined behavior #87119
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #87154
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Move Utf8String experiment to dotnet/runtimelab #3

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix a determinism issue in `lowerSpillTempsLiveAcrossSafePoints` #2299

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Initial version of a multi-threaded compiler #2297

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MSBuild property ArtifactsPath is overloaded; used by both .Net 8 and Microsoft.Build.Artifacts #33052
  • C# 11 required properties do not compile on dotnet 6 #33049

Closed

  • Display download progress while downloading SDK via dotnet-install.sh script on Linux CLI #32604
  • Issue with NU1505 during upgrade to .NET 8 #32234

PullRequests

Created

  • ProcessFrameworkReferences if tool packs are required #33062
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Update branding to 7.0.305 #33059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.108 #33057
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.411 #33056
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.314 #33055
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.119 #33054
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adapt to the change to MockPostAction #33047
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update the rid to the latest #32883
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Improve warning message for ILLink runtime pack #33041
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [Containers] Fix registry operations that use chunks and various resiliency enhancements #33019
    Area-Containers
  • PackageValidation compare TargetFrameworkInformation instead of TargetFramework property directly #33036
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Set PlatformName and other properties early enough in outer build #33003
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Startup race condition #33007
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] added `Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Utils.dll` to package content #32375
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 7.0.8
  • Add dependencies needed for source-build PVP flow #33039
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [WIP] Add support for starting the application through CMD (instead of ENTRYPOINT). #33037
    untriaged
  • Containers: add support for using 'podman' without a system 'docker' alias. #32783
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32975
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add GarbageCollectionAdaptationMode msbuild property #33043
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fuzz test the incremental state table #68459
    17.7
  • EnC analyzer does not register changes in a custom attribute with target #68458
  • Extend "Convert to Interpolated String" to support cultures #68455

Closed

  • Unexpected recommendations after `unsafe` keyword in using declarations #67985
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33805.424 #68453

PullRequests

Created

  • Add more interceptors tests #68462
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge internal fork of LSP tools back into Roslyn #68461
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move off of recursion when determining pp-directive information for a file. #68460
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix 'Use Local Function' fixer in code style layer #68457
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Refine parsing of potentially ambiguous casts/index expressions with collection literals #68456
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure we only ask for a symbol's documentation comment once #68452
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix completions after `unsafe` in using directive #68334
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add design for interceptors with nonzero arity #68218
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Skip checks for overridden or hidden members in overload resolution with extension methods #68316
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix inserting new values with source generators #68451
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Fix HasFileLocalTypes check for constructed types #68386
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement extension member lookup (non-generic) #68342
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Implement definite assignment and region analysis for inline array types #68339
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Switch to primary constructors in IDE layer #68299
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add assertions for shape of possibly intercepted call #68447
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for 'primary header spans' in sticky-scroll. #68450
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix 'use local function' with implicitly typed lambdas #68448
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Include file-local name prefix in names of explicit interface implementations #68331
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allocate less in GetTypeByMetadataName #68415
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Switch to new lower-overhead spell checking protocol #68426
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Only record class can have a copy constructor. #68442
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Don't rebind object initializer parents #68449
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support 'foreach' for inline arrays. #68297
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Initialize 'Flags' and 'DeclarationModifiers' in constructor of SourceMemberMethodSymbol #68347
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Design Debt, untriaged
  • Implement IOperation support for inline array access #68373
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Set TypeDeclarationFlags.AnyMemberHasAttributes for a type with parameter list and a method-targeted attribute. #68444
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • `makeNotNullMembersMaybeNull` - skip primary constructor capture fields #68441
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • [EnC] Upgrade change types for containing types #68368
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Asp.Net Core API controller memory leak repopend #45098 #48641
    Discussions
  • IExceptionHandler is missing XML docs #48640
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, json #48636
  • Is the Blazor web app (United) model still as easy to develop as blazor? Will the interaction between onlick and js still be as easy as it was in blazor? #48633

Closed

  • Signal R Cookie Authentication not working with Blazor Server #48628
  • Perf improvement: caching, json, single_query #48634
  • Perf improvement: caching #48635
  • Render a server component into the page #46353
    8.0-preview6
  • Parse named pipe endpoint from URL with BindingAddress #45056
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Build from source error MSB4036: The "GenerateFileFromTemplate" task was not found. #48629
  • Very odd bug in blazor wasm when calling a js browser extension #48453
  • Perf improvement: single_query #48596
  • InferMetadata_PopulatesCachedContext #48630

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 7.0.8 #48644
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.19 #48643
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm remove prefix allocations #48642
    area-blazor
  • Added ppc64le architecture to support testcases on power machine. #48638
    community-contribution, area-hosting
  • Add routing metrics #48637
    blocked, area-runtime
  • Minor debugging visualizer cleanup #48632
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4580469` to `06f44bc` #48584
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `45228c8` to `d60cf22` #48585
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6

Updated

  • Send CloseMessage from client to server #48577
    area-signalr
  • RDF test migration for some response test cases. #48611
    area-minimal
  • Expose SNI hostname in ITlsHandshakeFeature for Kestrel/HttpSys #48572
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.6.23305.3 #48619
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Take cascading parameter attribute type into account when supplying cascading values #48554
    area-blazor
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching, area-middleware
  • Add refresh token support to BearerTokenHandler #48595
    area-identity
  • Avoid repetitive GCHandles in IIS WebSocket operations #48462
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Handle methods that never return in Api Analyzers #48623
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm complex type support. #48567
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm dictionary support #48565
    area-blazor
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #48414
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-middleware
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm primitive collections #48559
    area-blazor
  • Fix F# MVC template #48600
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Update WebHostOptions.ShutdownTimeout to 30 seconds #48606
    community-contribution, area-hosting
  • explicitly identifying button type in QuickGrid columnbase #48277
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Improve pfx support for CertificateConfigLoader #43719
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • for CI purposes: try on-by-default #47958
    area-networking
  • use new System.Text.Ascii APIs, remove internal helpers #48368
    area-networking
  • Rename ASP.NET Core metrics #48375
    blocked, area-signalr, area-networking, area-middleware
  • feat: add StringSyntaxAttribute for guid and timespan args #48402
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Introduce KestrelServerOptions.AllowUnsafeHostHeaderOverride #48460
    blocked, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-06

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui Blazor - SCCM Remote Control freezes any input after connecting #15481
  • Deployment error when debugging on iOS Local Device: "Could not find a part of the path..." #15480
  • Cannot change the border color of an ImageButton #15479
  • When a shadow is applied to a button style, it does not switch back to visualstate Normal #15477
  • CarouselView not working properly in StackLayout #15476
  • Disconnecting a monitor in a multi monitor setup breaks Maui window if app window is hidden #15475
  • Can't build Maui from main branch #15470
  • When I copy location coordinates to an entry control, the format is modifed and I lost the "," character #15469
  • CollectionView only measure first item on Windows #15468
  • Black screen upon starting debug. #15467
  • problem with pointer gesture recognizer command parameters #15466
  • Bound VisualState property does not get read at item creation #15464
  • Flyout Items not working properly #15463
  • Installing maui-ios Workload on Mac Fails #15461

Closed

  • Get geolocation using maui web view #15451
  • FlexLayout exception when window is very small #10518
    Backlog
  • Color options missing #10611
    Backlog
  • [BUG][Android] Absolute Layout's layout flags and bounds not working in initial loading condition. #10944
    Backlog
  • FlyoutBackgroundColor not working when FlyoutBehavior is locked. #11028
    Backlog
  • Label does not get wrapped when in Grid with ColumnSpan #11863
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5] Update ModalNavigationManager.cs #15486
  • [net8.0] Update ModalNavigationManager.cs #15485
  • Add the drag and drop gestures back to the appium ui tests for mac/ios targets #15484
    area/testing
  • Update ModalNavigationManager.cs #15483
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 #15478
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1774.30 to 1.0.1823.32 #15474
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • make VisualElement.Focus() and VisualElement.Unfocus() virtual #15473
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: block projecting json entities/collection at root level in a tracking query #31047
  • DbUpdateConcurrencyException exception when saving a master-detail graph where detail entity PK is Guid. (or Not)? #31042
  • Fair IQueryable<T>.ToArrayAsync() #31040
  • Make EngineEdition easier to understand #31037
  • Translate DateOnly.ToString() / TimeOnly.ToString() ?? #31035
  • HasConversion for DbContext wide #31034

Closed

  • EFCore SaveChanges with Child entiies #31043

PullRequests

Created

  • Support any expression type inside inline primitive collections #31046
  • Update branding to 7.0.8 #31045
  • Update branding to 6.0.19 #31044
  • Imporved ToArrayAsync extension method #31041
  • SQLite Tests: Don't use Cache=Shared #31039
  • Make EngineEdition more readable - #31038
  • Disable trigger enumeration on Azure Synapse Analytics, where triggers are not supported #31036

Merged

  • Remove implicitly dependent reference #31006
  • Use raw literal strings goodness #31031

Updated

  • Generate OPENJSON with WITH unless ordering is required #30983
  • Support customized reading and writing of JSON values #31021

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Need offline installer for .NET7+ #16593
  • Microsoft .Net Core Version 5.0.17 keeps reinstalling #14473

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #16607
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #16605
  • Enable PVP flow for nuget.client #16603
  • Update branding to 7.0.305 #16602
  • Update branding to 7.0.108 #16600

Merged

  • Update branding to 6.0.119 #16597
  • Update branding to 6.0.411 #16599
  • Update branding to 6.0.314 #16598

Updated

  • Add known RID platforms to generated BundledVersions props #16578
  • Add a source-build smoke test for native debug symbols #16488
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Download smoke test prereqs in prep script #16359
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Enable per repo pvp for vstest in source build #16576
    Area-SourceBuild
